title: Episode Sixteen: Into the Storm
description:
SURVEY: https://survey.libsyn.com/ageofnapoleon
 
Napoleon returns to Corsica. The former king is executed; royalists rise up to avenge him. Napoleon fights in his first (real) battle. Paoli breaks with the Bonapartes and with France. Napoleon and his family flee Corsica.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
